languages.text: "Простор Коронус не может оставаться без Лекс Империалис и его блюстителей. Адептус Арбитес выберут себе нового, более достойного маршала, и продолжат защищать Империум от беззакония!"

"The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"
languages.original_text: "Простор Коронус не может оставаться без Лекс Империалис и его блюстителей. Адептус Арбитес выберут себе нового, более достойного маршала, и продолжат защищать Империум от беззакония!"

traits.locale_text: "The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"

"The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"

"The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"

languages.text: "Die Koronus-Ausdehnung darf nicht des Lex Imperias und seiner Hüter beraubt werden. Das Adeptus Arbites wird einen neuen Marschall wählen, der seines Postens würdiger ist und das Imperium gegen jedwede Gesetzlosigkeit verteidigt."
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Koronus-Ausdehnung darf nicht des Lex Imperias und seiner Hüter beraubt werden. Das Adeptus Arbites wird einen neuen Marschall wählen, der seines Postens würdiger ist und das Imperium gegen jedwede Gesetzlosigkeit verteidigt."

languages.text: « Les Étendues de Koronus ne peuvent se passer ni de la Lex Imperialis ni de ses gardiens. L'Adeptus Arbites choisira un nouveau maréchal, en veillant à ce qu'il soit plus digne de son rang que le précédent, et continuera à protéger l'Imperium de l'anarchie ! »
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"

traits.locale_text: « Les Étendues de Koronus ne peuvent se passer ni de la Lex Imperialis ni de ses gardiens. L'Adeptus Arbites choisira un nouveau maréchal, en veillant à ce qu'il soit plus digne de son rang que le précédent, et continuera à protéger l'Imperium de l'anarchie ! »

languages.text: “科罗努斯扩区不能没有帝国法典，也不能失去法典的守护者。法务部要选出一位新的元帅，一位更适合履行职责的元帅，继续守护帝国，对抗一切违背律法的恶行！”
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"

traits.locale_text: “科罗努斯扩区不能没有帝国法典，也不能失去法典的守护者。法务部要选出一位新的元帅，一位更适合履行职责的元帅，继续守护帝国，对抗一切违背律法的恶行！”

languages.text: «La Extensión de Koronus necesita la Lex Imperialis y a sus guardianes. ¡El Adeptus Arbites elegirá un nuevo Mariscal, uno que merezca el cargo, y seguirá protegiendo el Imperium contra la ilegalidad!».
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"

traits.locale_text: «La Extensión de Koronus necesita la Lex Imperialis y a sus guardianes. ¡El Adeptus Arbites elegirá un nuevo Mariscal, uno que merezca el cargo, y seguirá protegiendo el Imperium contra la ilegalidad!».

languages.text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスは、レックス・インペリアとその守護者がいなければ放っておけない。高等裁定局は、その地位にふさわしい新たな将帥を選び、帝国を無法から守り続けよ！」
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"

traits.locale_text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスは、レックス・インペリアとその守護者がいなければ放っておけない。高等裁定局は、その地位にふさわしい新たな将帥を選び、帝国を無法から守り続けよ！」

languages.text: "Koronus Enginliği, Lex İmperialis ve muhafızlarından mahrum bırakılamaz. Adeptus Arbites, istasyonuna daha layık yeni bir Miralay seçecek ve İmparatorluk'u kanunsuzluğa karşı korumaya devam edecektir!"
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse cannot be left without the Lex Imperialis and its keepers. The Adeptus Arbites will choose a new Marshal, one who is more worthy of their station, and continue to guard the Imperium against lawlessness!"

traits.locale_text: "Koronus Enginliği, Lex Imperialis ve muhafızlarından mahrum bırakılamaz. Adeptus Arbites, istasyonuna daha layık yeni bir Miralay seçecek ve İmparatorluk'u kanunsuzluğa karşı korumaya devam edecektir!"
